HEALTHCARE AND PHARMA
Beta Epsilon team of experts seamlessly combines strategy, big data and advanced analytics, and implementation processes to change the way healthcare companies think, decide, and act.
Beta Epsilon builds business-relevant analytics that can be leveraged is a critical success factor. We offers strong capabilities for statistical mining, predictive modeling, machine learning, deep learning, model life cycle management and artificial Intelligence techniques, while enabling organizations to integrate these techniques into their day-to-day operations and workflows to augment decision making at point of care. We provides a cross-functional data analytics team of data scientists, statisticians, business analysts, data architects and clinical informatics professionals with deep healthcare domain expertise.
Integrated Data - Our knowledge in Healthcare Enterprise allow us to quickly integrate data from multiple disparate data sources and bring it onto a single source-of-truth integrated data. Data from EMR systems, Claims, Billings, HR Systems etc can be integrated to give key insights
Automated BI and Visualization - Our BI & visualization platform automatically extracts relevant data to track and report on the selected measures and generates an easily accessible report. Monitor and measure the quality of care being provided to each and every patient on the go, and plan timely intervention.
Cost Optimization: Optimizing cost & processes using data that can certainly reduce expenses and overall profitability of healthcare organizations.
